sections.heading: improvements and growing crops of lessee; appraisers; qualified; oath
sections.text: The appraisers shall be qualified by the county judge and an oath administered in the same manner as required by sections 76-707 and 76-708.SourceLaws 1967, c. 467, ยง 6, p. 1453.

72-240.15.Permitted improvements and growing crops of lessee; appraisers; qualified; oath.

The appraisers shall be qualified by the county judge and an oath administered in the same manner as required by sections 76-707 and 76-708.

SourceLaws 1967, c. 467, ยง 6, p. 1453.
